page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: This block is well served by religious establishments. This varies from the traditional Church of England and Roman Catholic Churches to those of the New Testament of God and temples which serve people in the West Indian and Asian communities. The churches have quite large congregations showing that religious beliefs have endured. As well as serving as a source of spiritual welfare the churches perform good work in the community.Churches such as the Portway Rd. Congregational Church run play schemes for children under 5 and others have activities for both children and adults. Churches vary in age.Most were built with new housing.These mount most activities. Weddings are the most frequently performed ceremony.Others less so.
